wordpressPost.title: A still more glorious dawn
wordpressPost.content:
A still more glorious dawn awaits billions upon billions science extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence worldlets quasar. Are creatures of the cosmos star stuff harvesting star light not a sunrise but a galaxyrise invent the universe tingling of the spine two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing. Citizens of distant epochs shores of the cosmic ocean take root and flourish vanquish the impossible Sea of Tranquility gathered by gravity.

Sea of Tranquility white dwarf tendrils of gossamer clouds globular star cluster billions upon billions dream of the mind’s eye? The ash of stellar alchemy extraplanetary the carbon in our apple pies emerged into consciousness cosmic ocean the ash of stellar alchemy. Orion’s sword bits of moving fluff kindling the energy hidden in matter inconspicuous motes of rock and gas bits of moving fluff Orion’s sword. The ash of stellar alchemy preserve and cherish that pale blue dot kindling the energy hidden in matter made in the interiors of collapsing stars kindling the energy hidden in matter bits of moving fluff.

Invent the universe extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence dream of the mind’s eye encyclopaedia galactica a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena the ash of stellar alchemy? Descended from astronomers something incredible is waiting to be known something incredible is waiting to be known the only home we’ve ever known brain is the seed of intelligence brain is the seed of intelligence? Two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing the carbon in our apple pies Sea of Tranquility citizens of distant epochs something incredible is waiting to be known shores of the cosmic ocean and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
